content: @Kalle Kytölä have you had a chance to look at #16489?
@Yaël Dillies do you know if @Kalle Kytölä is generally around?
He might still be on holidays for another week

I'm "around" in some sense, except last week I was organizing a conference, which kept me occupied absolutely full-time during and before it, and this week I'm catching up with everything that I had to drop for the past couple of weeks... I'm hoping to have Lean time in some near-ish future (maybe next week).

I'm generally in favor of splitting the file, but I did not have time to look at the division carefully yet.
@Kalle Kytölä if you'd be able to find just one minute for this, I'd appreciate it
Maybe we should just go ahead with the split? It looks reasonable to me
